title: Boxplot vs Violin
description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of creating box plot and violin plot using Python Matplotlib library. Box plots and violin plots are used to visualize the distribution of data.

meta.title: Boxplot vs Violin: Visualizing Data Distributions
meta.description: Explore the power of box plots and violin plots to analyze data distributions in Python.
meta.keywords: violin plot, matplotlib, python, data visualization, box plot
